meanings.definition: The visual representation of data or information.
meanings.sent1: The graphics on the screen helped me understand the numbers better.
meanings.sent2: She used colorful graphics to show the sales trends in the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The graphics on the report were so clear, I almost thought they were real!
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was like a graphic novel, painting a vivid picture of the data.
meanings.sent5: The graphics in the textbook made the information come alive.

meanings.definition: The use of diagrams, charts, or images to convey a message.

meanings.sent2: The infographic used simple graphics to explain complex concepts.
meanings.sent3: The graphics on the sign were so funny, they made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like a graphic novel, illustrating his points with vivid images.
meanings.sent5: The graphics in the advertisement caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: The art or practice of creating visual images or designs.
